text: BMS Herlev Wolfpack, commonly known as simply Wolfpack, is a professional basketball team based in Ballerup, Denmark. The team was established in 2014, as a result of a merger between the local clubs Falcons, Glostrup IC and BMS Skovlunde. ==Season by season== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%; text-align:left" !Season !Tier !League ! !Danish Cup ! colspan=2 | European competitions |- |style="background:#efefef;"| 2014–15 | style="text- align:center;"| 1 | Basketligaen | align=center|5th | | colspan=2| |- |style="background:#efefef;"| 2015–16 | style="text-align:center;"| 2 | First Division | align="center"| 2nd | | colspan=2| |- |style="background:#efefef;"| 2016–17 | style="text-align:center;"| 2 | First Division | align="center" style="background:#BBF3BB"| 1st | | colspan=2| |- |style="background:#efefef;"| 2017–18 | style="text-align:center;"| 1 | Basketligaen | align="center"| 7th | bgcolor=silver|Runner-up | colspan=2| |- |style="background:#efefef;"| 2018–19 | style="text-align:center;"| 1 | Basketligaen | align="center"| 7th | First round | colspan=2| |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2019–20 |1 |Basketligaen |6th |First round |colspan=2| |- |} ==Players== ==References== Category:Basketball teams in Denmark Category:Basketball teams established in 2014 Category:Sports teams in Copenhagen Category:2014 establishments in Denmark
